data.description: Welcome to this charming 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath home in the sought-after Howell School District! Situated on a freshly hydroseeded, fenced-in corner lot, this property offers ample outdoor space and privacy. Under a builder's 10-year structural warranty, rest easy knowing your home is secure. Inside, find new flooring and paint throughout, creating a fresh and inviting atmosphere. The kitchen features stylish granite counters, and there's a large deck perfect for gatherings. Additional perks include a shed for storage and an unfinished basement ready for your personal touch. Nestled in a friendly community with new homes, this is a perfect place to call home!  *Call for information on how a Veteran can assume this loan!
